<a id="VisualShaderNodeParticleMultiplyByAxisAngle"></a>

# VisualShaderNodeParticleMultiplyByAxisAngle

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNode](VisualShaderNode.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A visual shader helper node for multiplying position and rotation of particles.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This node helps to multiply a position input vector by rotation using specific axis. Intended to work with emitters.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="VisualShaderNodeParticleMultiplyByAxisAngle_property_degrees_mode"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **degrees_mode** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#VisualShaderNodeParticleMultiplyByAxisAngle_property_degrees_mode)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_degrees_mode**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_degrees_mode**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the angle will be interpreted in degrees instead of radians.
